name: Zeri Fear
coverLetter: I'm new to the southern oregon area and larger scale trimming gigs, only have experience doing personal trim and harvests in the last year. Have a truck I use as a mobile camp and a tent that, if there is any space still available, I would like to be able to set up to live-work at & around the harvest area. I can cover my own meals as I have a portable stove setup, but any meals provided would be appreciated. I'm used to doing early morning farm work thru a number of WWOOF gigs, and would be available from early in the morning(8am) to midevening (6pm) for various task.
